book: 2196-Ghost Democracy Lightbulb Vitamin C Serum (2020 formulation)

y a few drops onto damp skin, after your cleanser and before moisturizer. Smooth and ”pat pat pat” the serum into skin.  Use morning & night for best results.

Warnings: Avoid direct contact with eyes.  If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water.  If skin irritation develops, please discontinue use.  Keep out of reach of children.
